name: trueblocks.public.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Access to the Ethereum data while remaining fully local
description: TrueBlocks builds an index that lets you explore the Ethereum blockchain from your local machine

warnings.onInstall: You must set the RPC_PROVIDER and ETHERSCAN_KEY variables before installing the DAppNode Package in order for the setup to work correctly.

author: TrueBlocks, LLC  (https://github.com/TrueBlocks)
